item.title: ‘She’ll let him live there for free’: My sister wants to buy our impoverished brother’s house. Is that a bad idea?
item.description: “Her only concern is that it will show up as an asset or rental property on her end.”

item.title: Sorry, retirees — the 4% rule won’t work for you if Vanguard is right about where the stock market is headed
item.description: A “lost decade” of low stock returns can be devastating for older investors

item.title: AI air pocket, struggling consumer could prove a double whammy for stocks next year, says Bank of America
item.description: Don’t look for outsized gains from the S&P 500 next year, the headwinds are numerous warns Savita Subramanian.

item.title: American Eagle had Sydney Sweeney. But its lesser-known lingerie brand carried the day.
item.description: American Eagle raises outlook for the holiday quarter and the year on ‘strong momentum’ for sales.

item.title: Macy’s surprises Wall Street by reporting sales growth and a profit, but the stock pulls back
item.description: Macy’s reported an unexpected profit — and growth in a key sales metric — but in premarket action Wednesday, the stock gave back some of its stellar r...
